Package core

Interface MachineRandom

All Known Implementing Classes:
Accountant, ActionCardDeck, Athlete, Board, BuyAnItem, CareerCard, ChristmasBonus, CollectFromPlayer, ComputerConsultant, Doctor, FileALawsuit, Hiking, HouseCard, ItsYourBirthday, Lawsuit, LawsuitBlue, Lawyer, PayTheBank, PayThePlayer, RacecarDriver, SalaryCard, SellAnItem, Server, SetupSchool, TrafficViolation, VisitAPlace, WatchAShow, WinACompetition, WriteABook
public interface MachineRandom
Interface representing a game component that requires a machine-generated random number (that is, it does not require any interaction from the player), usually to initialize one or more of its attributes at the start of every game

The implementation of the method in this interface varies depending on the specifications of the component. Typically, an upper and lower bound are supplied, and increments have to be taken into account, as is the case in most of the cards (except for some blue cards).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getMachineRandNum()
    Abstract method for returning a randomly generated number

  • Method Details

    • getMachineRandNum

      int getMachineRandNum()
      Abstract method for returning a randomly generated number

      All implementations of this method in this machine project use the Java ThreadLocalRandom utility class. Therefore, the number is generated in a pseudorandom fashion, which is adequate for the purposes of the game.

      Returns:
      randomly generated number
